attributes.action: Start looking after the British people in this country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We Want Gordon Brown to realise he is not a cross between a god and adolf hitler. He must stop giving tax payers money to all and sundry abroad, while here in the UK, the people are monitored in every shape and form, and he has plans to increase this even more, which he must stop.
He must slow immigration to a trickle, and deport every illegal person in this country now. We want our rights and country back, now! we are the forgotten people of this rudderless nation. He has got to remind all mp's that they are to serve the people, and to stop claiming as much money as they can.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Statements that don't actually request any action
